name: Bassumi Bakes
description: A user-friendly online platform showcasing a variety of desserts, including cakes, cupcakes, and brownies, available for order.

name: Data Platform Project
description: The team is taking over a MEVN stack web application project with goals to enhance the original app, add features, and expand documentation. New features include profile picture uploads, front-end user confirmation for irreversible actions, and improved data loading by consolidating multiple requests per page.
